comment: If there is an upper limit on the degree of a polynomial that is lower than the degree of some exponent bag, then that exponent bag is unrepresented in the polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)
